spl_product_data_elements: Gze HotSoap TURMERIC TURMERIC OIL TURMERIC WATER GLYCERIN TURMERIC TURMERIC BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER UNSAPONIFIABLES STEARIC ACID
inactive_ingredient: Aqua Stearic Acid Glycerin Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
purpose: Helps to achieve a better shape.
indications_and_usage: Apply soap on body during bath time. Leave it on for 5-10 minutes with concentration on the concemed area of the body Rinse thoroughly.
stop_use: Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs.
do_not_use: Do not use on damaged or broken skin.
when_using: When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
dosage_and_administration: Apply soap on body during bath time. Leave it on for 5-10 minutes with concentration on the concemed area of the body Rinse thoroughly.

spl_product_data_elements: EELHOE Kojic Acid Turmeric Cleansing Pads GLYCERIN ASCORBIC ACID TURMERIC TURMERIC GLYCERIN KOJIC ACID KOJIC ACID CHRYSANTHELLUM INDICUM TOP CHRYSANTHELLUM INDICUM TOP
active_ingredient: Active Ingredient(s) CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) ROOT EXTRACT、KOJIC ACID、CHRYSANTHELLUM INDICUM EXTRACT、ASCORBIC ACID
purpose: Purpose 1. Adding turmeric and kojic acid can reduce the onset of acne, lighten dark spots,promote even skin tone, and make the skin more radiant. 2. Deeply clean the skin, remove dirt and excess oil, and prevent pores from being clogged. 3. It can deeply nourish the skin, long-lasting moisturizing, restore the skin's moisture and fullness, andrejuvenate it.
when_using: Use 1. Clean and moisturize skin 2. Using warm water, massage the pad onto the skin in circular motions 3. Leave on for 10 minutes and rinse thoroughly
warnings: Warnings Please keep out of reach of children.Do not swallow.Please clean your hands before use to ensure the best results from the product.Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.Store in a cool and dry place.
stop_use: STOP USE Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur.
keep_out_of_reach_of_children: Please keep out of reach of children. Do not swallow
storage_and_handling: Avoid freezing and excessive heat above 40C (104F) ） Store in a cool and dry place.
do_not_use: Do not use Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash occur

brand_name: EELHOE Kojic Acid Turmeric Cleansing Pads
